thread.title: Carvers Begins to Gear Up & Expand their Ski & Snowboard Line in Anticipation of the Breckenridge Winter Season
thread.title_full: Carvers Begins to Gear Up & Expand their Ski & Snowboard Line in Anticipation of the Breckenridge Winter Season

author: Thad Eldredge
title: Carvers Begins to Gear Up & Expand their Ski & Snowboard Line in Anticipation of the Breckenridge Winter Season
text:
Carver’s Breckenridge Ski Shop is preparing for the winter 2015 season by increasing their ski & snowboard equipment for purchase or rental. They will be continuing to offer incredible Breckenridge bike rentals ( http://www.breckenridgeskishop.com/rentals/colorado/ ) for the remainder of the summer. Summer is the time of the year to explore and what better way to do that than biking through the stellar Breckenridge community. Whether you are interested in exploring the quaint town via bike or ready to hit the mountainous terrain, the professionals at Carver’s will take care of your every need. Breckenridge bike rentals are by far the best bet in town. They want to make every experience a memorable one for every person in the family. Carver’s offers bike rentals for kids, women and men. Each family has their own unique biking needs and Carver’s is set to take care of those needs with exceptional customer service, affordable rates (especially for families) and superior knowledge.
Breckenridge is home to outdoorsy locals and a destination for thousands of travelers each year. For the travelers, it can be hard to find the best trails or the most reliable equipment. Carver’s makes this process easy. The professionals at Carver’s ask customers what is important to them, what they want to experience and how much they want to spend. Then these wonderful Breckenridge bike rentals ( http://www.breckenridgeskishop.com/rentals/texas/ ) professionals find the package deal that meets the needs of these travelers every time.
Customers travel to Breckenridge Ski Shop knowing that they will find the best deal here. Many of the customers also choose to book online to save a whopping 20% and for those who book for 5 days, get the fifth day for free. As for Breckenridge bike rentals, Carver’s carry tandem bikes, jr. bikes, baby joggers, carriers, bike path cruisers and mountain and road bikes. Rentals are available for 2 hours, 4 hours, a full day, 24 hours and 2 or more days.
As the leaders of bike rentals ( http://www.breckenridgeskishop.com/ ) in Denver, Carvers beats out their competition through price, skill and quality.
About Carvers
Thad Eldredge and his staff know a thing or two about Breckenridge. Carvers has been serving our mountain community for 20 years. Be sure to catch up with them to get the rundown when visiting.
Carvers/ 203 N. Main Street/ Breckenridge, CO. Winter Hours: 8am-8pm daily. Summer Hours: 9am-6pm daily. if you have any questions please call (970)453-0132, 1-800-568-7010, or email carvers(at)colorado.net.
website: http://www.breckenridgeskishop.com/
